attributes.action: stop the FAs non competitive junior football plans
attributes.additional_details:
The FA have set out guidelines to stop Children playing league and competition football.
In 2013/14 season both under 7s,u8s and under 9s will have no league system and will play friendly football games.
This will in 2014/15 move to other age groups.

This new approach to football will begin in 2013/14 season for under 7s, 8s and 9s. Then, as those under 9s move to under 10s, they will carry on with this system into 2014/15 and under 11s in 2015/16.

You can speak to any parent at any club and they will tell you that no child will have any chance of winning the league, nothing to aim for and can have as much fun playing football in the streets with friends.

This in turn will effect the way our British children will perform and compete for years to come.

Please sign this e-petition and stop the rot.

rejection.details: This is one for the Football Association, not the Government.
